description: Chihiro was the wife of http://anidb.net/ch147009 [Shiunji Kaname] and adoptive mother of the seven Shiunji siblings but passed due to an illness when they were still young. Kaname made a promise with Chihiro that on the 15th birthday of the youngest child, http://anidb.net/ch142581 [Kotono], he will reveal the truth about the fact that they are not related by blood at all.
name: Shiunji Chihiro
